column4: Does Compiz work the same with Xubuntu as it does with Ubuntu? Since none of the 52 people in #xubuntu will answer my question.
well it doesn't seem to be working correctly
Compiz only requires a working X session and 3D drivers, regardless if there is a DE running or not
What is the output of ps ax|grep compiz ?
That means compiz is not running. Try starting it with this command and pastein the output if it does not work: compiz --replace & disown
That is normal output. If ps ax|grep compiz|grep -v grep shows output, it means compiz is running
well, now all my open windows look messed up...
Now try cube and other effects
You dont want your window manager to cease running because then nothing will be managing your windows!
It should start a decorator.. try compiz --replace & gtk-window-decorator --replace & disown
Sorry, I thought cube was working?
cube is working, but the visuals of my theme are now screwed up.
The visuals of your theme? Screenshot?
